input.sentences: the japanese palace was very impressive .
there were tons of pigeons outside .
we hit up the spinns store afterwards .
as we walked back | i noticed that the streetlights looked like lanterns .
i almost ran into the man with a horse mask on while looking at the lights .
output.sentences: The trip to Japan was wonderful and one of the most impressive sights were the magnificent palaces.
The many pigeons residing in the crevices of the palace roof was a reminder of home.
The nightlife there was exciting and also familiar as we joined the long lines outside of a club called Spinns.
The interior was different from what we expected with oddly spaced unfamiliar lighting.
We still have not figured out what the person with the horse head wearing a hat was all about.
